dishes.Name: Biryani
dishes.Recipe: Marinate chicken in a blend of yogurt, garlic, ginger, and a mix of spices, then partially cook it. Parboil the basmati rice with whole spices like cardamom, cloves, and cinnamon. In a pot, layer the chicken and rice, and top with saffron-infused water. Cook over low heat until all flavors meld together. Serve hot, garnished with fried onions and fresh herbs.

dishes.Name: Masala Dosa
dishes.Recipe: Soak rice and urad dal (split black lentils), grind into a batter, and let it ferment overnight. Make a thin crepe-like dosa on a hot griddle. Prepare a spiced potato filling by cooking boiled potatoes with onions, mustard seeds, and turmeric. Place the filling inside the dosa, roll, and serve with coconut chutney and sambar.

dishes.Name: Butter Chicken
dishes.Recipe: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices, then cook in a creamy tomato sauce with butter, ginger, and garlic. Add garam masala and cream for richness, creating a smooth, mildly spiced sauce. Serve with naan or rice.

dishes.Name: Paneer Tikka
dishes.Recipe: Cut paneer into cubes and marinate with spiced yogurt. Skewer with onions and bell peppers, then grill or bake until charred. Serve with green chutney.

dishes.Name: Chole Bhature
dishes.Recipe: Cook chickpeas with onions, tomatoes, and spices to make chole. Prepare dough for bhature by mixing flour and yogurt, then roll and deep fry until fluffy. Serve hot with chole.

dishes.Name: Jollof Rice
dishes.Recipe: Prepare a flavorful tomato and pepper sauce with onions and spices. Add rice and cook until the rice absorbs the sauce. Add chicken or vegetables if desired.

dishes.Name: Egusi Soup
dishes.Recipe: Roast and grind egusi seeds, then cook them with meat or fish in a sauce made of palm oil, tomatoes, onions, and spices. Add spinach and serve with pounded yam.

dishes.Name: Suya
dishes.Recipe: Thinly slice the meat and season with ground peanuts and spices. Grill until smoky and charred. Serve with sliced onions and tomatoes.

dishes.Name: Moi Moi
dishes.Recipe: Blend soaked beans with onions, bell peppers, and spices. Steam the mixture in small containers until it sets. Serve as a savory side or snack.

dishes.Name: Pounded Yam and Egusi
dishes.Recipe: Pound boiled yams until smooth and stretchy. Cook egusi soup with meat and vegetables, serve the yam and soup together.

dishes.Name: Momo
dishes.Recipe: Prepare a dough and fill with spiced meat or vegetable filling. Shape into dumplings, steam or fry, and serve with a spicy dipping sauce.

dishes.Name: Dal Bhat
dishes.Recipe: Cook lentils with turmeric and spices to make a hearty dal. Serve with steamed rice and a selection of vegetable side dishes.

dishes.Name: Thukpa
dishes.Recipe: Prepare a spiced broth and cook noodles in it with chicken or vegetables. Garnish with green onions for extra flavor.

dishes.Name: Sel Roti
dishes.Recipe: Mix rice flour, sugar, and milk into a thick batter, then deep fry in ring shapes until golden brown and crispy.

dishes.Name: Gundruk
dishes.Recipe: Salt mustard greens and let them ferment for a week. Dry them in the sun, then serve as a side dish or seasoning.
